tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_trading (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    trade_date DATE NOT NULL,
    trade_time TIME NOT NULL,
    cryptocurrency_symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    trade_volume DECIMAL(18,2),
    trade_price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_trades (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    cryptocurrency_symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    trade_volume DECIMAL(18, 4) NOT NULL,
    trade_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    authority_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (authority_id) REFERENCES regulatory_authorities(authority_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trade_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_id INT,
    authority_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (trade_id) REFERENCES cryptocurrency_trades(trade_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (authority_id) REFERENCES regulatory_authorities(authority_id)
);

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_trades (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    trade_date DATE NOT NULL,
    trade_volume DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    trade_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE trading_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_id INT NOT NULL,
    authority_id INT NOT NULL,
    analysis_date DATE NOT NULL,
    analysis_result VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);
